item.title: Appeals court allows Trump administration to remove ethics watchdog Dellinger — for now
item.description: The Supreme Court is likely to determine whether President Donald Trump can fire Hampton Dellinger as head of the Office of Special Counsel.

item.title: House censures Rep. Al Green for heckling Trump during speech to Congress
item.description: Fewer than 30 members of the House of Representatives have been censured. Green said about interrupting Trump, "Truthfully, I would do it again."

item.title: Government ethics watchdog fired by Trump drops lawsuit challenging dismissal
item.description: Special Counsel Hampton Dellinger said the Supreme Court could take months to resolve the question of whether his termination by President Trump was l...

item.title: 'Tariff war, a trade war or any other type of war' — China says it's ready to fight U.S. until the end
item.description: Beijing announced Tuesday additional tariffs as high as 15% on certain U.S. goods, starting from March 10 and a series of new export restrictions for ...

item.title: Tensions between Trump and Europe could could have an unintended beneficiary: China
item.description: As the Trump administration shakes up transatlantic ties, analysts told CNBC that China is making strategic moves to get closer to Europe.
